question: 18th World Wind Energy Conference and Exhibition (WWEC2019) was organized in which country?
explanation: World Wind Energy Association (WWEA) organized the 18th World Wind Energy Conference and Exhibition (WWEC2019) from 25-27 November 2019 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. The conference focused on opportunities offered by a renewable energy strategy. The conference held a discussion to set up strategy including wind power as a cornerstone of a country\'s energy supply system that is based on renewable energy
